Reading

I will be checking READWORKS TOMORROW MORNING! Log in and complete the activities.

Please make sure students log in to ReadWorks and complete the assigned stories. New passages have been added, including one on the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning.
Students should also read their library books and complete the AR quizzes once finished.

ReadWorks login:

www.readworks.org/student

Class code: YU6GQ2

Password: [REDACTED] (unless already changed)

Math 

Great job completing your math test.

I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science

Read and complete 152-159

This blooket will help you prepare for the test

https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=6970529c7a98935214a111a5

Literary Fair Poster Project

You will use a presentation board to show your understanding of your book in a clear, creative, and visual way. Your work should be neat, colourful, well organised, and easy to read.

Centre of the Board

Place the picture you drew in art class in the centre. It should show an important scene, character, or idea from your book.

Under the picture, include the book title, author, publisher, and publication date. This information should be centred and easy to read.

Left Side of the Board

Include:

Main characters (with names and pictures)

Setting (where and when the story takes place, with pictures)

Plot (a short summary of the story)

Label each section clearly. Typed work is allowed, but the font must be large enough to read from a distance.

Right Side of the Board

Include:

The problem

The solution

Author’s purpose

Why I liked the book

Five key words with short explanations

All sections must be clearly labelled and neatly organised.

Theme and Design

Choose a theme that matches your book and use it across the whole board. Use colours, borders, shapes, and images to make your poster eye catching and professional.

Pictures and Graphics

Include pictures for the main characters and the setting. These may be drawn or printed. Your board should be highly visual, not just text.

Your goal is to create a creative, graphic, and high quality poster.
